front.title: LMP Extensions for Sonet and SDH

abstract.t: This memo is a companion document to [LMP] detailing Sonet and SDHspecifics. This document extends current definition of LMP withrespect to standard SDH and SONET features. It provides an overviewof different SONET/SDH interface capabilities, standard SONET/SDHfeatures and functions and defines LMP protocol extension to be usedwith SONET/SDH interfaces. In addition, it considers a relationshipdescription which SONET/SDH features mentioned in this document aresupported by LMP and GMPLS signaling respectively.
